## Welcome to Eli's page!


Eli is an MPS student in Global Development with a focus on agricultural inputs in Central America and East Africa. His research areas of interest include:  

* Soil amendments derived from the sanitation sector in Western Kenya (Led by R. Nelson & C. Midega)
* Poultry feed value chain development in Kenya and Honduras, using *Hermetia illucens* as a protein source (Led by L. Leonard, C. Midega, J. Orozco)
* Aquaculture feed development at Cornell (Led by E. Won)
* Optimized water utilization from new wells in Central and South America  

Learn more about Eli at his MPS profile: https://cals.cornell.edu/global-development/education-training/mps/mps-2024-25-cohort/eli-newell
